text: Jacques Amalric (6 October 1938 – 4 June 2021) was a French journalist. He was the editor-in-chief of Le Monde and was the managing editor of Libération. His son is actor Mathieu Amalric. He was born in Montauban, France. Amalric died on 4 June 2021 in Ajaccio, France at the age of 82.Le journaliste Jacques Amalric, ancien chef du service étranger du « Monde », est mort == References == Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French journalists Category:French editors Category:People from Montauban Category:Writers from Occitanie
title: Jacques Amalric
